Anna Maria Beach Rentals Home All Rentals Anna Maria Beach Rentals It’s fair to say that some of the best vacations start with access to the best views. When your idea of an incredible getaway includes waking up to the sight of sugar-white sands and blue waves each day of your stay, booking one of our Anna Maria Island, FL beachfront rentals promises to please! When you’re searching for accommodations to match, Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals has you covered. We’re proud to offer our guests access to a portfolio of prime property options that are situated right on the beach. Our Anna Maria beachfront rentals tantalize the senses, offer up incredible amenities and ensure that travelers will revel in the views they deserve from the very moment they arrive. Whether you’re someone who prefers to shop and dine their way through a stay, you love to stroll the shoreline or you’re all about getting out on the water in style, Anna Maria Island is a place that’s designed just for you. Embrace Island-Style Living There’s nothing better than booking a home away from home right on the sand. At Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals, we know what it takes to create customized stays for travelers and our Anna Maria Island accommodations on the beach are bound to inspire at every turn. Anna Maria Island villas at the beach are available in shapes, styles, and sizes to accommodate traveler preferences of all types. Whether you’re looking for a 1-bedroom abode or require upwards of 4 bedrooms across multiple levels with balcony access to match, we have what you’re searching for. Even our Anna Maria Island 2-bedroom rentals prove to be the perfect beach accommodation! Our Anna Maria Island, FL beachfront rentals can be booked for weekend getaways, weekly stays, or last-minute adventures too. While all of our Anna Maria beach rentals provide travelers with a one-of-a-kind place to call their own during an Anna Maria Island visit, our commitment to quality and comfort is evident throughout all of our selections. Guests will find that many of these beach properties provide access to spacious floorplans where open living standards are elevated. It’s common to find floorplans also include large windows throughout that frame the fantastic beach view day and night while promoting maximum natural light flow during the daytime hours. Home layouts like these offer up seamless transitions between living, dining, entertainment, and sleeping spaces during a guest stay while also bringing the beauty of the outdoors inside. Tasteful and stylish furnishings are always a part of the experience for those who book an on the beach rental through Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals. Collections tend to capture the essence of island living through style standards while promoting home-inspired comforts as well. We’re always adding new homes for rent in Anna Maria Island to our portfolio with all the newest amenities in the vacation rental industry. When guests aren’t out enjoying their surroundings, customizing their downtime is just as enjoyable. Access to wi-fi and high-speed internet is available in many of our Anna Maria beachfront rentals. this means that when a cozy night in is what guests crave, they can easily settle into a plush sofa and stream movies and shows on large flat-screen television all at the touch of a button! Testimonials What Our Guests Are Saying Stephanie Northington Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals is THE BEST! Both as an owner and a renter, this company always offers warm, personal service, and is most responsive to any issues or problems that may occur during the rental process. Their wonderful staff is always polite, courteous and friendly, and always seems to want to please. Bravo to a great company!!! Paul Fisher Coastal Cottages were brilliant. This was our first vacation rental on Anna Maria and they handled it flawlessly. The property was spotlessly clean and tidy, beautifully presented and in a great location on the canal (Lake La Vista?) and Pine Avenue. The staff are helpful and knowledgeable. Wholeheartedly recommended for a stay on Anna Maria Linda Mee We stayed at a Place in Paradise last month and had a wonderful time. The property is conveniently located near local stores, shops, bars and restaurants, all within a few minutes walk. Most importantly, it is less than 2 minutes to the glorious gulf beach of Anna Maria Island. The rental has everything you need, is comfortable and tastefully decorated and furnished, with a great relaxed vibe. We had a small issue with the TV and the team at Coastal Cottages were terrific and sorted it out within the hour while we were out enjoying the sunshine! Return to Listings Take Time to Unwind Your Way Making the most of the time on Anna Maria Island often includes exploring the local restaurants. However, those who book a beach rental through us will always have the option to serve up a home-style meal instead! Many of our Anna Maria Island beachfront vacation rentals enjoy full kitchens that are comprehensive and designed to inspire. Guests will find access to spacious counters, high-end appliances and custom cabinetry filled with cookware makes it easier than ever to serve up breakfast, lunch, or dinner on a whim. When it’s time to dine, guests can gather around interior dining room tables or head out to large balconies, patios, and furnished decks to make it an alfresco meal depending on the property they’ve selected. If added luxury is what would make your Anna Maria beachfront rental an even more satisfying experience, we have you covered. Be sure to ask about our on the beach rental options that include private pools and hot tubs as well as beautiful all-season porches, designer furnishings, extra-large master suites, outdoor kitchens, and pet-friendly amenities too. From properties with cathedral ceilings to those that feature fantastic tile work, hardwood flooring, coastal-inspired aesthetics, and beyond, we’ll make sure that the details that matter most are already in place upon your arrival. Reserve our Anna Maria Beachfront Rentals Today Taking time to unwind on Anna Maria Island is always a good idea. Making sure you have a beach view to match makes it even better. Enjoy the best of it all when you book our beautiful Anna Maria Island beach house rentals through the team at Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals the next time travel plans bring you this way. Get in touch today to learn more about our many exciting property options and how we can help you start planning! Return to Listings FAQs about our Anna Maria Vacation Rentals What time is check-in and check-out? Check-in begins at 4:00 p.m. EST on the date specified in your Rental Agreement. Check-out time is 10:00 a.m. EST to ensure the property is properly cleaned prior to the arrival of the next guest. What amenities are included in my stay? Each of our rentals is thoughtfully equipped to make your stay comfortable. Amenities typically include a fully stocked kitchen, fresh linens, towels, Wi-Fi, and beach essentials like chairs and umbrellas. Specific amenities may vary by property, so please refer to your rental's listing for detailed information. What activities are available nearby? Anna Maria Island offers a variety of activities for all ages. Guests can enjoy water-related activities such as fishing, boat tours, kayaking, and stand-up paddleboarding. Additionally, the island features beautiful beaches, local shops, and cultural attractions to explore. Are there any recommended restaurants in the area? Absolutely! Anna Maria Island boasts a range of dining options. For waterfront dining, consider The Waterfront Restaurant & Craft Bar, known for its views of Tampa Bay. Other local favorites include Blue Marlin Seafood and Beach House Waterfront Restaurant, each offering unique menu and atmosphere. How can I get around the island? The island is accessible and easy to navigate. Many guests opt to rent bicycles or golf carts to explore. Additionally, the free Anna Maria Island Trolley operates daily from 6:00 a.m. to 10:30 p.m., providing convenient transportation across the island. Book Anna Maria Vacation Rentals Today Book Anna Maria Vacation Rentals Today AVAILABILITY CALENDAR Golf Cart Included RENTALS Private Pool RENTALS Concierge Collection RENTALS Boat Dock RENTALS WHERE LIFE'S A BREEZE As a full-service management company, the SeaBreeze Vacation staff always strive to ensure all guests have a memorable vacation on Anna Maria Island and a comfortable home experience in our Anna Maria Island Florida rentals. Whether you’re looking for a couples retreat, a family getaway, or a large group gathering, we have Anna Maria Island homes for everyone to enjoy! Every stay comes with complimentary guest services, 24/7 maintenance, and professionally cleaned high-quality linens. Pet-friendly Anna Maria vacation rentals, properties with docks, and lodgings with elevators add another touch of convenience. For a fun, hassle-free way to explore the island and easily tote items, our golf cart rentals will do the trick. Book your stay with us and Anna Maria Island will become your Happy Place! Best Rates Guaranteed Why book direct with SeaBreeze Vacation? We guarantee the best rates for our vacation homes and no hidden fees — just the rental rate, cleaning, tax, damage waiver, and pet fee, if applicable. You’ll enjoy a quality vacation home and complimentary services. After all, you work hard. You deserve the best value for your Anna Maria Island vacation. Let us help you find the perfect vacation home! Flexible Cancellations SeaBreeze Vacation acknowledges the #1 concern before booking — having to cancel due to unpredictable times in life. With guests like you in mind, we created a flexible cancellation policy. You can cancel bookings up to 14 days before check-in and receive a  refund.* Look forward to an Anna Maria Island vacation at our rentals without worrying! Learn more here. Island-Based As we’re based on the island, consider the staff at SeaBreeze Vacation as the neighbors you’ve always wanted. We’re either island locals or longtime transplants and will share with you our top secret knowledge of the best places to see and things to do on Anna Maria Island. If you’re in need of any item or maintenance, we’re just down the street and will come straight to you! Located in the Heart of Anna Maria Island Thousands of vacationers visit Anna Maria Island every year from all around the world to relax, unwind and spend time with friends and family on our top-rated beaches and enjoy the many activities the island and the surrounding area have to offer while staying in our Anna Maria Island Florida vacation rentals. SeaBreeze Vacation is a local family-owned vacation rental and property management company located in the heart of Anna Maria Island in our custom-built 3,100 sq.ft. facility to serve both our guests and property owners. We constantly strive to be the best and look for ways to improve by listening to our guests and property owners, watching market trends, and providing the best products for all our Anna Maria vacation rentals.

If you’re looking for a vacation to remember or searching for a local property manager that cares for your property as if it were our own, contact us today. Contact Us Call Us Today! 941-462-4227 A Wide Range of Properties Suppose you plan a long romantic weekend away, a family vacation, or a more extended winter stay on Anna Maria Island to avoid the snow and colder weather. In that case, you’ll want to stay in a vacation home that is beyond your dreams.

SeaBreeze Vacation offers a wide range of vacation homes to suit your needs and budget. In addition, our homes vary in price, amenities, and sizes, so regardless of your requirements, we have a property to exceed your expectations, ensuring a vacation to remember!

Our reservations team is available Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. – 10 p.m. EST and Saturday-Sunday, 9 a.m. – Midnight EST to answer any questions and help plan your next dream vacation. Including the arrival and departure schedule. It made our trip and stay very comfortable and would choose them again in the future for help with vacation plans. Guest Rating 5.0 View More Photos Misty Beach We had a wonderful time on vacation, and working with SeaBreeze was a BREEZE!. The reservation process was easy, and check-in and check-out was just as easy. We have previously booked with other Vacation Rental Companies in the past that had extra fees included as well as quite a confusing check-in process. SeaBreeze Vacation made the entire process so easy. We have already recommended SeaBreeze Vacation to our friends and family. We will definitely book with them in the future! Guest Rating 5.0 Sunset Paradise at Runaway Bay 105 We stayed for two weeks! Excellent location, really great to walk right across the street and be on the beach in 120 steps! And the pool is just about the same from the back door! All furnishings are brand new and the TVs were easy to operate. We were able to load our accounts very easily on the ROKU units. Washer and dryer are brand new! SeaBreeze checked in on us and were very courteous! Highly recommend this brand new renovated condo on Anna Maria Island. Guest Rating 5.0 View More Photos Seaglass Cottage We loved our week with my sister at Seaglass Cottage! The layout was perfect for two couples, so very private from each other with separate bathrooms and access to the beautiful backyard pool area from each area too. The entire cottage was so beautifully decorated and everything we wanted was provided. We took advantage of the bikes to explore about and all of the beach gear came in handy too! But that backyard!! It was…. Paradise!! Can’t wait to come back… Guest Rating 5.0 Casa Bliss Casa Bliss is absolutely beautiful! We had the most amazing time! The condo itself is in a perfect location - just minutes from the beach and walking distance to restaurants (which were also amazing!). It is beautifully decorated, clean and spacious- absolutely loved the high ceilings and doors, did not expect that at all in a “condo”. Everything that we needed was provided. I cannot wait to return to Anna Maria Island. I know I have found my home away from home in Casa Bliss! About Us Home About Us Office Hours Our office hours are Monday through Saturday 9:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. (EST) Our office is open on Sundays seasonally . Location We are located in the city of Anna Maria, in the old Post Office Plaza. Our office address is: 9908 Gulf Drive Suite A, Anna Maria FL, 34216 Contact Information You may reach us by phone at 941-567-6253 Our primary email address is: Info@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com About Us Family-owned and operated, Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals is one of the top Anna Maria Island rental agencies and offers exceptional vacation homes and quality service with a personal touch. Whether it’s a family vacation or a romantic getaway, Anna Maria Life has something for everyone. From beachfront to bayside, you can choose from a quaint one-bedroom cottage , a waterfront condo with stunning views of the Gulf of Mexico , or a multi-bedroom pool home . Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals offer authentic island living at an affordable price. Accommodations can be as upscale or as casual as you like and many are pet-friendly so you won’t have to leave your furry family member at home. About Us Located 40 miles south of Tampa and seven miles west of Bradenton, you’re going to love AMI. Once you cross the Anna Maria Bridge on Manatee Avenue (U.S. State Road 64) over the Gulf Intracoastal Waterway and take in the stunning azure blue Gulf of Mexico waters and white sand beaches, you will understand vintage Florida ambiance and why people fall in love with this area. Just use our state-of-the-art online reservation system to preview and compare vacation rentals. Then when decided, reserve and pay for your rental with confidence, trust and security or, if you prefer, contact us directly at 941-567-6253 . Our staff will go the extra mile to ensure you find the perfect vacation home. We hope that by visiting our site and viewing our properties, it will be the beginning of a wonderful experience and you’ll look to us for your favorite annual destination along the beaches of southwest Florida. Next Meet The Team Billi Gartman Owner Billi@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com Billi fell in love with Anna Maria Island during a visit for her best friend's wedding. She left just long enough to pack up her big city life and make the move to this small island town! She knew in her gut this was the place to grow roots. Since that time, she has built a career, a life, and a family here on Anna Maria Island. Over the past 10 years she has been honored to work with so many wonderful people, and build thriving businesses on the island through networking and personalized face-to-face relationship building. The island is her home and she has a constant finger on the pulse of the community, vacation rentals and the local market Matt Lyndon Owner matt@annamarialifevacationrentals.com Amy Smith General Manager Amy@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com I moved to Florida in 1999 from Long Beach Island, NJ where I grew up. I had come here on vacation and loved it so much I drove home, packed my bags and I have been here ever since. My daughter, who is 20 and awesome, has lived on the island for many years. Like so many others, I love the beach and catching as many sunrises and sunsets I can. After working with the same vacation rental company for 12 years on the island, it was time for a change. I only sent my resume out to one opportunity I saw online and fortunately it was with Coastal Cottages, which is now Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals. Billi and I hit it off right away and we dug in and went to work. It’s been exciting to watch our hard work transpire into something so great. Cheryl Shih Reservations & Channel Manager Cheryl@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com Hello! It's me, Cheryl Shih. I am originally from Rochester, NY, but have called Florida home since 1996. I have a 17 year old son, Erik, and a sweet pup named Hank, my pit mix, who rescued me in March 2019. He's the first dog of my life and we are deeply in love. I have worked in the hospitality industry for nearly 30 years and love working with our guests to plan the perfect vacation. A few of my favorite things are; yoga, reading a good book, spending time with family and friends, and floating in the sea while working on AMI. I also love to ride my bike, Angel, and explore the island. Everyone should rent a bike while on the island, it's an amazing way to get around and see everything. My goals; finish the book I started writing in 2016, get into full pigeon pose during yoga, see a dolphin, and make vacay dreams come true! Dana Fasciglione Guest Services & Reservations Manager dana@annamarialifevacationrentals.com After 25 years of living in New York, I decided it was time to switch things up a bit! With many relatives living on Anna Maria, I've vacationed here since childhood. After my most recent visit, I packed my car and headed South. I have worked various jobs, but never quite knew where my career path would lead me. I am so grateful for the stepping-stones that led me to Anna Maria Life, and my wonderful group of colleagues. With the combination of my experience in customer service and my Bachelors in Psychology & Communications, guest services is where I belong! Brian Shoemaker Maintenance & Billing Brian@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com I am Brian Shoemaker. Originally from Kentucky. My wife & I would vacation in Florida once or twice a year. We decided to move to Florida 7 years ago so she could be closer to her family. My mom & sister are still in KY, but we hope to get them moved down here, too. I worked a few jobs before finding my place with vacation rentals. Once I started working on Anna Maria Island, I knew this is where I belong. I was fortunate to be brought on with this amazing team at Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals, formerly known as Coastal Cottages. Working on an island & along with a dedicated team has truly been a blessing. When not at work, I'll be on the golf course with my dad. We were able to convince him & his wife to move down from IL a year ago. Getting out on the course with him like I used to growing up is so much better because we can practically play all year long. IF I'm not on the course, I'll be home taking care of our fur babies. 3 dogs & a cat. They are a handful. Tommy Winkler Lead Maintenance Tech Tommy@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com Tommy is originally from Indianapolis, and has lived in Florida for eight years. He’s spent 20 years in construction, maintenance, and damage restoration. He knows this island and our homes inside and out and is a huge asset to Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals. Tommy and his wife Dorothy have three boys, He loves country music, Colts football, and family time. Jena Greco Maintenance Coordinator jena@annamarialifevacationrentals.com I relocated to Bradenton Florida in 1989 from the Northwest suburbs of the Chicago area with my parents and my older brother. I attended elementary school, middle and high school here. In 2010, I was blessed with my beautiful daughter who is now 13 years old. I love to go fishing whenever I get the chance but most of all, I love spending time with my daughter and my family going out on the boat any chance I get. I have 15+years in the customer service and the property management fields. I am very passionate about providing a seamless property management experience and I am very consistent and committed with all my customers. Lindsey Lewis Webmaster & Marketing Lindsey@AnnaMariaLifeVacationRentals.com Lindsey Lewis is the Head of Marketing, content creator, and resident computer nerd at Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals. Among other things, she manages our email marketing campaigns, social media, and most of our website content and upkeep. Lindsey thrives in dancing the line between technical and creative, and loves that her position offers her the opportunity to do just that. Lindsey worked in resort operations and taught customer service for a large vacation company for several years before leaving corporate America to concentrate on marketing full time. Lindsey left her beloved Anna Maria Island in 2017, to raise her two boys closer to extended family. She lives in Indiana but continues to work on the Island remotely. She comes ‘home’ to the Island several times per year to work from the Anna Maria Life office, reconnect with coworkers and friends, and float in the Gulf of Mexico. Lindsey considers herself the evangelist of the virtues of the meandering solo road trip. She loves traveling, outdoor adventures, creative writing, music, and the oxford comma. Amber Miller Bookkeeper amber@annamarialifevacationrentals.com My name is Amber Miller, and I am the Bookkeeper for Anna Maria Life. My favorite part of being a bookkeeper is being able to work closely with homeowners to define the details. – Everyone loves the “bean counter”. Colette Fernandez Reservations and Guest Services colette@annamarialifevacationrentals.com Born and raised in the sunshine state, Living the dream in paradise every day! I enjoy showing around this beautiful small island I call home, creating new memories with people from all over the world. Rachael Denzin Reservations and Guest Services rachael@annamarialifevacationrentals.com My name is Rachael Denzin. Name * First Phone * Email * Address Message Comments This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. 100% Safe & Secure Our Story Built upon a need for a smaller “boutique-style” rental company with more personalized services, Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals began in June of 2010 as Coastal Cottages AMI. Our company was founded by Sue Carlson, who moved to Anna Maria Island from chilly Michigan and began to invest in real estate. She soon discovered that she was renting her own properties more than the rental agency she had hired! The solution? Build a better vacation rental company! Sue would go on to build two thriving vacation rental companies, at different times, as well as a real estate firm, An Island Place Realty. In 2018, Sue decided it was time to spend more time up North and turn her vacation rental company, Coastal Cottages AMI, over to new and trusted hands. Her friend and colleague of 14 years, Billi Gartman was the perfect choice! Billi Gartman came to Anna Maria Island for her best friend's wedding in 2006, and fell so madly in love with the island that she returned home to Dallas just long enough to pack her things and talk her then Boyfriend (who would become her Husband,) into making the move to paradise! Since 2006 Billi and her husband have been busy starting a family and starting businesses, all revolving around tourism, vacation rentals, and real estate. Billi has been a real estate agent for nine years and has been under Sue Carlson’s An Island Place Realty for many of those years. Billi took the reins to Coastal Cottages in the summer of 2018. Since then, she has assembled a team of the finest professionals whose vast experience and passion yield exceptional service that goes far beyond the reservation process. In 2020 Billi felt that it was time for a fresh new look. She chose a new name and logo to better exemplify what we have to offer. After all, we have much more than cottages to boast, and we really do love sharing the Anna Maria Lifestyle with our guests! Thus in January of 2021 we became Anna Maria Life Vacation Rentals, and introduced some exciting new technology to benefit both our owners and guests. Finally, we launched our brand new website! While our new banner exemplifies our passion for a bright future for our beloved family of homeowners and guests, we remain the same team of professionals, under the same leadership as we were when called Coastal Cottages AMI. We're still one of the best Anna Maria Island rental agencies, and we will continue to provide the same amazing experiences to our beloved guests. She came to the island from Tampa, FL where she worked for the Embassy Suites in Downtown Tampa since 2007. She fell in love with the coffee shop business and opened a coffee shop with her then mother-in-law, MJ, when she was married to MJ’s stepson who was in the Air Force. Bev has always enjoyed helping others. While being a military dependent she volunteered for the Officer’s Wives Club and did many things for the military community and the families of these communities. She served on the Board in various positions and enjoyed her time helping others. When MJ asked if she would like to open a coffee shop on Anna Maria Island back in 2010, she worked diligently through 2011 until she found the perfect spot for their coffee shop. She immediately went to the Chamber of Commerce to join because she felt that would help her become a part of the community. She and MJ started volunteering by helping the Chamber with Bayfest, prior to their opening Island Coffee Haus in Nov, 2012. She continues to volunteer for the festivals as she enjoys the interaction with the members of the Chamber and the communities on the island. After becoming a resident of the island in 2012, Bev continues to enjoy all the permanent and transient residents on the island. Her coffee shop has become a meeting place for people to come and enjoy. She has found her paradise. Wayne Gunter Treasurer When a mortgage discussion arises, many people in Manatee and Sarasota County can say that they had an extraordinary home financing experience with a true Mortgage Banking professional. This professional that many speak of is Wayne Gunter, Mortgage Loan Officer/Banking Officer for BB&T Home Mortgage in Bradenton, FL. Wayne’s commitment to superior client service along with his attention to detail has helped position him as a “Top Performer” within BB&T. Wayne graduated from the College of Business at the University of Florida in 1995 and has been originating mortgage loans over the past sixteen years. His high level of expertise, strong commitment to his community and dedication to his field are just a few things that set Wayne apart as a true professional as well as a highly sought after expert in his field. Over the past 10 years, Wayne has focused his mortgage expertise on Anna Maria Island, where he has become well known in the real estate industry as the island’s local mortgage expert. A native of Manatee County, Wayne and his wife Jenny are raising their two sons; Brycen and Brennen in the same neighborhood he grew up in. Susanne Arbanas Secretary Susanne Arbanas has a background of many successful years in international guest relations, services and management in both the aviation and hospitality industry. Upon returning from Australia to Anna Maria Island in 2008, She founded Anna Maria Island Concierge Services where she worked diligently with local business owners and visitors to enhance their “Island Experience”. Susanne continues to be a key motivator in bringing new and innovative ideas to our community through volunteering and working with our local businesses and organizations. She is our island “Director of Contagious Enthusiasm”! Dan Alderson Dan and wife Sandy became residents of Cortez in 1998, moving from Minnesota. In 2008 their son, Rob, and his wife Laura, purchased Tyler’s Ice Cream, a 24 year old business needing TLC. Since, they changed operations and recipes back to founders Larry and Gerri Tyler’s vision, ice cream made and served with love. All of Tyler’s ice cream is made on site. Tyler’s was honored with the AMI Chamber Small Business of the year for 2013. Dan enjoys small business and continues to help with the growth of Tyler’s in Cortez, Bradenton and Longboat Key David Berube David is the owner of CG&B Publishing, LLC of Bradenton. David moved to Bradenton with his wife, Cindy & son, Matthew in 1990 from Westbrook, Maine, where he worked in the printing, paper and publishing industries. In Florida, he continued in the printing industry, in sales, for Coastal Printing of Sarasota. He also owned his own company, Book Binders of Florida, Inc., a hardcover book binding firm. In 1996, he opened Book Binders Printing & Publishing, Inc. and in 2008 he opened CG&B Publishing, LLC of Bradenton. CG&P is the official Publisher of the Visitor’s Guidebook for the Anna Maria Island Chamber of Commerce, the 2011 Bayfest Booklet and the Manatee County Chamber’s monthly “Current” Magazine. David is very active in AMI Chamber events and volunteers at the AMI Chamber office. Eric Cairns Eric came to Anna Maria from Ohio where he was a general contractor for 25 years and successfully operated his own business. He has been an Anna Maria Island businessman and manager of Cedar Cove Resort since 1999. Years ago, Cedar Cove Resort became one of the original founders of the Anna Maria Island Chamber of Commerce. Eric continued this tradition when he became a Founders Club Member. Eric has been an active member of the AMI Chamber of Commerce and presently serves on several of the Chamber’s committees. Special Interests: Cedar Cove Resort donates regularly to the MS Foundation and Breast Cancer Foundation. Eric is an army veteran and a helicopter pilot. Cedar Cove Resort has been voted the “Best Beach Resort and Hotel” on the Island for the last several years. John Campora John Campora has over 16 years in investing and banking experience. He works at Edward Jones in Bradenton. He has lived and worked in Manatee County for 40 years. John enjoys helping people reach their financial goals. Having been adopted and raised by a single mother, John understands the challenges of one-income families and the value saving can have on a person’s future. John enjoys spending time with his wife and young son. Katy Demick Chairman of the Board Originally from England, Katy moved to Anna Maria in 2000, planning to stay and work here for a year. After that first year, she decided this was where she wanted to live. Eighteen years later and counting, she is still here. Katy is married to David, has two dogs, and lives in Bradenton. Katy has worked for Anna Maria Island Resorts (Tortuga Inn; Tradewinds; Seaside Inn and Tropic Isle Inn) since its inception in 2009 but has worked for David Teitelbaum since 2003. She is now Assistant General Manager and attributes her knowledge of business to the very supportive mentoring from David and the general manager, Barbara Baker. Katy has been a committee member with Symphony on the Sand since 2013 and also enjoys volunteering with Manatee County Animal Services. Erin Leathem Erin Joy Leathem has a background in international marketing and a degree from Wake Forest University in Communications and Spanish. Before moving to Florida she lived all over the country. Her experience includes work at an international chamber of commerce in Washington, DC, helping Fortune 500 companies collaborate with international partners. As an Anna Maria Island resident, she loves life on the island and is thrilled to be able to work and play every day in paradise! With 26 years of marketing experience and nearly ten years on the island, she brings a breadth of knowledge to her work at Island Real Estate. After years of leading the Real Estate Marketing and Sales Team Administration, she transitioned to become a full-time Real Estate agent. With her technical and marketing background, and her involvement at the Anna Maria Island Community Center, and the Anna Maria Elementary School, she enjoys developing her personal and professional passion for the community. Karen LaPensee Karen LaPensee graduated from State College of Florida with a nursing degree. She spent 14 years working in emergency care, intensive care, surgery and as an Air Force Reserve Flight Nurse prior to starting LaPensee Plumbing with her husband Michael LaPensee in 1985. Karen became the President of LaPensee Plumbing • Pools • Air after Michael’s retirement in 2009. Karen has been a long-time active member of the Chamber of Commerce, serving as Treasurer, Secretary, and Chairman of the Board. With the help of a very capable staff LaPensee Plumbing • Pools • Air has been honored to receive the 2011 Manatee Chamber Small Business of the Year Award, the 2016 Anna Maria Island Chamber Small Business of the Year Award and the 2017 Longboat Key Chamber Small Business Person of the Year Award. Janet Mixon Janet Mixon and her husband, Dean Mixon are owners of Mixon Fruit Farms, an over 78 year old family owned business. Mixon’s is one of the top gift fruit shippers in Florida. Mixon’s also squeeze and bottle their juice for the community. Janet and Dean have diversified the business and Mixon’s has become one of the top Gulf Coast Destinations according to the Travel Channel. The Mixon Groveside Market is a wonderful experience. They have also added a tram tour through the grove where their customers learn about the history of citrus and the Mixon family and enjoy a visit to the wildlife rescue with crocodiles, alligators, raccoon, hawks, owls and much more. Injured animals that can’t be released into the wild that would normally be euthanized are provided sanctuary by the Mixon’s. During the year the Mixon’s host many non-profit organizations for fundraisers, sponsor a cooking competition for the local high school culinary arts programs, and also sponsor art events with students and local artists. Diane Phinney Diane Phinney moved here in 2010 from Massachusetts after renting for two seasons and agreeing with her husband that the people living on AMI were the friendliest people out of all the 19 states in which they had previously lived. A graduate with a BS from The State University of NY at Potsdam and a MA from Michigan State, Diane worked primarily in Social Work, Education and Non-Profit Administration. Her desire to help others was fulfilled with work in adoption, foster care, community education, battered women and troubled and at-risk youth. Community volunteerism has always been a passion. On AMI she has served as President of the Key Royale Homeowner’s Association, Secretary of Cultural Connections and PR Chair of Island Players. In addition, she has provided leadership to committees at The Center, The Tour of Homes, artsHOP and Food & Wine on Pine. Working and playing in the out-of-doors is one of Diane’s loves. With a friend, she started a kayaking group soon after moving here. In season, you might see a group of 15-20 people kayaking in Bimini Bay or paddling around Key Royale…. these would be the “Yakkers”. They understand, as Diane does, how the feeling of paddling these waters and observing nature all around them can be transforming. She encourages others to come experience all the island offers and to make Anna Maria their home. Mike Southwick Mike attended AMI Elementary, played football at the youth center, recalls the private airstrip where Holmes Beach City Hall resides and the lack of paved roads. Mike moved to Tallahassee as a child, but was drawn back to the island in 1996 due in part to a strong family presence (Mary Norman, co-owner of the Sterling Anvil, and Mike Norman Realty). Mike is currently co-owner of AAA Payroll Service, which was honored to be awarded the AMI Small Business of the Year Award for 2017. His professional background includes 10 years in the real estate industry followed by 20 years in the PEO industry. Mike supports local charities such as Wildlife, Inc., Manatee Children’s Services and the Navy Seal Foundation. Mike’s support of our military is due in part to his father, Captain C.E. Southwick who was a highly decorated Naval Aviator and former POW during the Vietnam War. Mike resides in Bradenton Beach with his wife Sheryl. They love boating, cooking, gardening, local and Alaska fishing trips. Wende Webb Wende Webb is the owner of a small business, Gulf Coast Property Watch. Her company proactively inspects properties for absentee owners and addresses any issues before they become major problems. Previously, Wende served as the Marketing Manager for SERVPRO (a Disaster Restoration company) for over 10 years. She has worked and lived all over the world and landed in Florida via a sailboat she lived and sailed on for 2 years. Her eclectic background includes studying ballet in Russia; being the first female surveyor in Denver, Colo.; and working for the U.S. government performing water and asbestos analysis. She became a certified diver while working as the Contract Administrator for an international marine construction company. She designed and marketed the 1st ‘egg-crate’ foam mattress pad to the commercial market through Cannon Mills. After a long absence, she went back to school at UF, received a degree in Nutrition and was published in 2010 in Nutrition Concepts & Controversies, a college level text book. She has served on a number of committees for the chamber, including the 60th anniversary chamber luau and annual fashion show. She loves working with the chamber, promoting the island and telling everyone ‘annamariaisland.calm’ is the perfect destination for you!
